entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
